content: knitted vest in drops puna the piece is worked with ribbed edges pattern no pu-054 yarn group b **sizes** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **materials** drops puna from garnstudio 250-300-300-350-350-400 g colour 03 brown **needles** drops circular needle size 4 5 mm length 80 cm drops circular needle size 3 5 mm length 40 cm and 80 cm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need circular needle of 80 cm in each size **knitting gauge** 20 stitches in width and 26 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm
